summary: Use this API to get the list of Recommended keywords by item and optionally a search keyword
description: Use this API to get the list of Recommended keywords by item and optionally a search keyword

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://open.admin.uat.shopee.io/api/v2/ads/get_rcmd_item_list?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=12312&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Error code, empty when no error returned

schema.name: warning
schema.description: If some data cannot respond normally, set the warning

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: request id is unique for each request

schema.name: item_status_list
schema.description: This is param to indicate the status of items, so sellers can know whether an item is eligible for ads or not.

schema.name: sku_tag_list
schema.description: The corresponding tag (or tags) that belong to item_id, sequences follow as best selling>best ROI>top search

schema.name: ongoing_ad_type_list
schema.description: Current status of the ad on this item. For example- no ongoing promotion, search ads, discovery ads, boost ads
